title: The Abduction from the Seraglio
description: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's opera masterpiece, the Abduction from the Seraglio (Die Entfuhrung aus dem Serail), is vibrantly interpreted in this performance by the Dresden State Opera Company, conducted by Peter Gulke, on this DVD.
